title: Rich Text Editor Component
description:
Clinical Rich Text Editor Component

Build a comprehensive rich text editor specifically designed for clinical documentation that supports text formatting, reusable templates, and configurable character limits.

Requirements:
- Implement rich text editing functionality with standard formatting options (bold, italic, underline, lists, headings)
- Create a template system for common clinical note types (SOAP notes, progress notes, discharge summaries, etc.)
- Add character/word count display with configurable maximum limits
- Implement validation to prevent exceeding character limits with clear user feedback
- Support autosave functionality to prevent data loss
- Include copy/paste handling that preserves formatting while sanitizing potentially harmful content
- Ensure keyboard shortcuts for common formatting actions
- Make the component accessible (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support)
- Add undo/redo functionality
- Support read-only mode for viewing completed documentation
- Consider medical terminology autocomplete or suggestion feature
- Ensure HIPAA-compliant data handling (no external service calls without encryption)

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Pasting formatted text from external sources (Word, web pages)
- Reaching character limit mid-word or mid-sentence
- Browser crashes or accidental navigation before saving
- Special medical characters and symbols
- Multi-language support for international deployments

Dependencies:
- Choose appropriate rich text editor library (Draft.js, Slate, Quill, TipTap, etc.)
- Define template schema and storage mechanism
- Establish character limit requirements per document type
